name: Legend of the Goblin Hoard
description:
Legend of the Goblin Hoard is a first person action game created for Ludum Dare 48. Descend into the lair of the Goblin horde and claim the famous treasure. Only the most brave and cunning warriors will prevail.

Change log

v1.1 Linux build.
v1.2 Ogre attack audio bug fixed + slightly moved shield out of the player’s field of view.
v1.3 Added text to clarify a player can press SPACE to continue after death.
v1.4 Minor balancing of enemies.
v1.5 Improved tutorial.
v1.6 Full controller support + sensitivity sliders.

Additional credits
